title: Memories of a radio
creator_credit: Gordon Preston and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Gordon Preston talks about his life, his love of the radio and the comfort it brings him. He shares key experiences from his life, like when he first arrived in Melbourne by ship and his vivid dreams and how his radio has followed him everywhere, sometimes illuminating the life he is missing out on, sometimes illuminating his memories and dreams.
